reviewText: I bought it as a gift for my grandfather. He really enjoyed it and even had my uncle watch it, who enjoyed it too.
Has a lot of go information to it. Show it to a young group of football player at HBC School like T S U

I love reading about  African-American  History that wasn't taught in the schools. You find out that African-Americans contributed a lot to America but was never talked about or sweep under the rug. Definitely would recommend!!!
Great film. Could be longer though. I hope they re-release something like this that deal with the past few years in the NFL.
